[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Work with us

We aim to employ individuals who match our aspiration of providing the best-in-class solutions to the offshore oil and gas and renewables industries worldwide. We believe our people are our most important asset, and we endeavour to create a great place to work through information, focus, development and dialogue.

To support our business strategy, we are looking for talented and qualified individuals to add to our pool of candidates who will to help us deliver our expertise globally as we grow. Are you one of them? If so then please apply to one of our vacancies or send us an unsolicited application.

See a list of vacancies for AqualisBraemar or Offshore Wind Consultants.

General enquiries

We are happy to receive unsolicited applications from newly-graduated or highly experienced candidates (fully qualified with relevant background).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our geotechnical staff are specialists in jack up leg penetration analyses, offshore site investigations, and geotechnical design and installation analysis for offshore oil & gas and wind turbine foundations.
